text:
FinFolio - Denver, CO

Hiring self-motivated full time WPF/C#/SQL and HTML/JavaScript developers. We are a small startup technology company that makes software for large professional wealth managers and financial institutions. We are self-funded but the founder (me) comes from the financial service startup world.

http://www.finfolio.com/Pages/Careers.aspx

Contact mattabar @ the above website if interested. Thx.
